title: FS: Low Grade T-206 Southern Leaguer Lot of 2
author: jmanners51

posts.post_title: FS: Low Grade T-206 Southern Leaguer Lot of 2
posts.post_content:
Available for sale as a lot for SOLD are the following cards:

SOUTHERN LEAGUE

Jimmy Hart (Old Mill)
Frank King (Piedmont)

Please add $5 for shipping and handling.

If you want to purchase these cards:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the cards. This post will secure the cards in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
